price: بلكې دوى دروغجن ګڼي حق لره هر کله چې دوی ته راغی، نو دوی په خبره ګډه وډه کې دي.
arabic: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِيٓ أَمۡرٖ مَّرِيجٍ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: bal kadhabū bil-ḥaqi lammā jāahum fahum fī amrin marījin
